abstract: Jon Caramanica reviews performance by country singer Dierks Bentley at Irving Plaza.
snippet: Commiseration was on the agenda at Irving Plaza as the country-music singer Dierks Bentley was greeted by a sea of raised Bud Lights.
lead_paragraph: Commiseration was on the agenda at Irving Plaza as the country-music singer Dierks Bentley was greeted by a sea of raised Bud Lights.

headline.main: Guy’s Guy, Keeping the Kegs Flowing
